pages.text: Mystical World does just that, make the world just a bit more mystical. Expect to see some new wild creatures as you wander about, as well as some new resources.$(br2)If you want to find out more, get yourself the book!
It's a very mysterious world out there! This book will grant you some insight into many of the mysterious and mystical things you might come across

pages.title: Aubergine Seed
pages.text: Aubergine seeds can be found throughout the world, wherever there is grass that can be broken.
